events.description: Special pods at Chester zoo helped conservationists breed and release more than 100,000 greater Bermuda snails A button-sized snail once feared extinct in its Bermudian home is thriving again after conservationists bred and released more than 100,000 of the molluscs. events.title: Trump administration wants to deport five-year-old detained by ICE in Minnesota
events.description: The Trump administration is moving to deport a five-year-old boy who was detained by Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents in Minnesota last month.

events.title: Norway's crown princess apologises for Epstein ties
events.description: Norway's crown princess Mette-Marit has apologised for her friendship with Jeffrey Epstein after the latest release of files about the late convicted sex offender.

events.title: British man sentenced to nearly 24 years for drugging and abusing boys at summer camp
events.description: A 76-year-old retired British veterinarian has been sentenced to 23 years and 10 months in prison on charges of child abuse after lacing candy he gave to his victims with sedatives at a summer camp last year

events.description: A diver who helped recover bodies from a deadly collision between a boat carrying migrants and a Greek coast guard vessel says most of the 15 people who died had suffered severe head injuries, as questions mounted over the circumstances of the incident

events.title: Fatwas, faith and fallacies: Myth-busting female genital mutilation in Africa
events.description: Olivia Albert, 19, was subjected to female genital (FGM) mutilation when she was 14. She told the UN sexual and reproductive health agency (UNFPA) that she hid her pain because everyone around her said it was normal.

events.description: The U.S., Ukrainian, and Russian delegations have agreed to an exchange of 314 prisoners, according to U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff's office.
